name: multicolor
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
having several or many different colors: a string of multicolor lights The teacher suggested using multi-color highlighting to identify different parts of a paragraph. Synonym
multicolored
More examplesFewer examplesIn the background, multicolor houses cascade down the surrounding hillsides.To serve on the side, I roasted multi-color carrots in the oven with olive oil, salt and pepper. These multicolor business cards grab the attention of people easily. He was wearing a white t-shirt, light blue jeans, and multi-color running shoes.
